lavage.title: Premium Wash
lavage.subtitle: Meticulous interior and exterior cleaning, high-end products selected by our experts, and special attention to the smallest details.
lavage.description:
At ADLR Cosmetic Auto, we consider washing as the essential first step in any quality car maintenance. Our two-bucket method, combined with high-end pH neutral products, guarantees deep cleaning without ever risking damage to your paint.

Each vehicle receives special attention, from the initial preparation with active foam pre-wash, to meticulous drying with premium microfibers. We clean every corner, every crevice, for an impeccable result.

Our team takes care of your vehicle as if it were our own, with passion and expertise.

polish.title: Corrective Polish
polish.subtitle: Give your car an incomparable shine. We use professional techniques to eliminate micro-scratches, swirls and holograms.
polish.description:
Corrective polish is the art of restoring your paint to its original shine by eliminating surface defects. Micro-scratches, swirls, holograms and other unsightly marks disappear under our professional machines.

Our process begins with a thorough analysis of your paint condition using special lamps. We then determine the level of correction needed and select the appropriate pads and compounds.

Each polisher pass is performed with precision, section by section, for a uniform and lasting result. Corrective polish reveals all the depth and brilliance of your paint.

ceramique.title: Ceramic Protection
ceramique.subtitle: Protect your investment with our professional ceramic treatment. An invisible high-performance barrier against UV and pollution.
ceramique.description:
Ceramic coating represents the pinnacle of automotive protection. This advanced technology creates a permanent chemical bond with your paint, forming a protective layer with a hardness of 9H on the Mohs scale.

Our professional ceramic offers exceptional protection against UV, pollution, bird droppings, tree resin and chemical contaminants. The extreme hydrophobic effect makes water bead up and significantly facilitates daily maintenance.

Before application, we meticulously prepare your vehicle with a corrective polish if necessary, ensuring an impeccable result under the ceramic layer.

cire.title: Premium Wax
cire.subtitle: Enhance your vehicle with our premium wax application. A brilliant result to reveal all the depth of your paint.
cire.description:
Carnauba wax remains the choice of purists to enhance their vehicle. From the Brazilian palm, this natural wax offers a warm and deep shine that synthetic protections cannot match.

Our premium wax contains a high content of pure carnauba, applied by hand by our experts. The result is an incomparable shine that highlights every curve of your bodywork.

Although its durability is shorter than ceramic (2-3 months), wax offers a unique visual finish and a maintenance ritual appreciated by car enthusiasts.
